title: List of Design System Metrics
content: I need a list of design system metrics - The Design System Guide Close Metrics # I need a list of design system metrics Romina Kavcic Here is the list of actionable metrics for design system ### Key design system metrics (most used) Time to Value (TTV): Measures the duration from the initial investment in the design system to the point at which it starts generating financial returns. Return on Investment (ROI): Assesses the financial return relative to the cost of implementing the design system. Adoption Rate: Indicates the percentage of products or teams utilizing the design system, reflecting its integration within the organization. Component Usage Across Products: Analyzes how design system components are reused across various products, highlighting the system's efficiency and consistency. Design to Development Time (Handoff): Measures the efficiency of the transition from design to development, tracking the speed and smoothness of the handoff process. Brand Consistency Improvement: Tracks the reduction of visual discrepancies and inconsistencies across the user interface, fostering greater familiarity with the product design. Documentation Visits: Measures engagement with and usage of design system documentation by team members, indicating its accessibility and usefulness.üîó Here is the whole list of design system metrics [https://thedesignsystem.guide/design-system-metrics] Next question Balance flexibility and consistency Published on: Nov 13, 2024 Updated: Updated: Nov 13, 2024 ## Latest additions Glossary I need checklists for creating new Figma components Top 15 Design Systems in 2024 Design system podcasts Design systems using Web Components I'm Romina Kavcic.
